Description: Body sherd of North Ionian black-figured pottery vessel; near vertical wall with little horizontal curvature inside glazed save for area at bottom of sherd; one added red band lined in white; exterior: griffin to right and filling ornaments including large rosette.
Curator's comments: The shape is unclear; there is little lateral curvature and the wall is slightly concave.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.193)
